name: Carded
description:
Welcome to my little game called "Carded".

I started working on this game as a entry to 2020 but it already really grew on me and im really having fun working on it.
Basically this is going to be a game about storage medias. Not just storage cards like in the current build but also stuff like hard drives, USB storages or floppy drives.

Currently there aren't any real game mechanics, but it's pretty much my next task to add real stuff to do and not only the sandbox mode.

If you have any ideas or things you would like to see in the game, don't hesitate to let me know!

Updates are coming regularly!
